testimonials.text: I have seen several of his design works for Universty fests, projects, sports tournaments etc. He is one of the very best I have ever seen when it comes to design sense. But this is not what made me write this recommendation. It was a very smooth journey to work with him on several projects. I strongly recommend him if you are looking for a helpful, kind, empathetic, energetic team-player with an awesome sense of design.

He is very a very hard working and efficient and trustworthy person.Was a competetive programmer in university life who has a clear programing knowledge. A very good web developer. Also holds good knowledge in mobile app development
